info.name: Pink Overload [Stylish for Chrome]
info.description: Don't install this - it won't do a thing until the next update of Stylish for Chrome. Then, it will only work for Stylish for Chrome.
info.additionalInfo: Testing... will Userstyles allow this, or not? Yes, if you're clever. https://forum.userstyles.org/discussion/45034/feature-request-apply-user-styles-to-stylish-chrome-chrome ...Changed extension ID to production Stylish ID. If you test this in an unpacked extension, remember to change the ID in @document to the ID of your unpacked extension. (And by you I mean me, of course.)
